Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek at AgentX Real Estate Berwick ***
Positioned on a prime corner location in the Grandvue Estate Officer opposite St Francis Xavier College & St Clare’s Catholic Primary School) is this amazing & very stylish family home. Offering you:
* Four bedrooms with an HUGE oversized master bedroom, complete with walk in robe and private ensuite. Remaining bedrooms are all large & oversized witted fitted wardrobes & share a further bathroom.
* Centralised kitchen, complete with island bench, a plethora of under bench & overhead cupboard space, stone bench tops & s/s appliances with dishwasher.
* Open planned main living zone with separated dining area.
* Westerly facing alfresco entertaining area, complete with extended decking with closable blinds & styled landscaped rear garden with established plants & garden shed.
Further completed by ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gorgeous quality porcelain tiling throughout main areas, LED lighting, quality window furnishings throughout, feature gas log fire place, alarm system, NBN available, recycled water, internal garage access & so much more…
A very stylish home with amazing finishes in the estate that everyone wants to live in, this surely ticks all the boxes.
Insights: 78 Majestic Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury in Arcadia!
Look no further, here is a home situated in one of Officers most prominent locations, the Arcadia Estate, a family haven that is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers. Rarely do you find a home such as this that ticks all the boxes. With an abundance of amenities including Schools, Officer Train Station, Arena Shopping Centre and freeway access just a stone throws away, this is the ideal location for the growing family. The home itself has plenty to offer with accommodation including four large bedrooms all featuring generous proportions and built in robes with the master hosting a ensuite and walk in robes. Walking through the home the large kitchen with stone benchtops and racked ceilings flows neatly into the open planned dining and living areas. Walking outside, be the envy of all your friends and family with what is surely one of the best outdoor entertaining areas to be seen. Creature comforts include ducted heating, split system air conditioners, double car garage with rear access and internal access, security system and all wrapped up on a 418m2 (approx.) block. A home of this calibre will not last long! Call now!

Description:
LOCATION AND LIFESTYLE – THE PERFECT MATCH!
Situated in the Arcadia Estate sits this modern light filled three-bedroom residence perfectly positioned for convenience and designed for comfort!
Offering a spacious open plan family/living and meals area that features vaulted ceilings with a feature light well, that opens seamlessly to the decked outdoor entertaining area creates the ideal space to relax and entertain. The adjoining sleek hostess kitchen is complete with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and ample storage.
The accommodation comprises of three generous bedrooms, master complete with walk in robe and ensuite, whilst the remaining bedrooms are serviced by a family bathroom and contain built in robes.
Additional highlights include, ducted heating, split system air conditioning on a low maintenance 236m2 allotment, makes this an opportunity not to be missed. Only a stone's throw from the Cardinia Road and Officer train stations, supermarkets and specialty shops - Ideal for either a first home buyer, astute investor, or downsizer. An Inspection will not disappoint!

Description:
Luxury living in arena
Situated on a 576m2 block and located in the highly sought after Arena Estate, this absolutely stunning Metricon ex – display offers you quality modern living for the whole family. Stepping inside this fastidiously maintained home you will find yourself falling in love with the spacious living zones,large bedrooms, quality finishes and outdoor entertaining space, which is the perfect place to unwind after a busy day at the office. Features include -
- 4 bedrooms, master with walk in robe & en suite
- Open plan meals/family room with gas log fire + rumpus room
- Entertainers kitchen with large walk in pantry, 900mm cooker and stainless appliances
- Decked outdoor alfresco complete with built in bbq and water feature
Quality of life goes much further than just a beautiful home, and with this prime location you are conveniently located just a stones throw from all the amenities you could ask for. Arena shopping precinct, great schools, public transport options and Monash freeway access ensure you will have everything you need to please the entire family. Don't miss out on this one, Inspect today!

Description:
Sky’s the limit on Skyline Drive!
Situated on a 659m2 corner allotment, this beautiful 6-year-old Porter Davis family home in the prestigious Grandvue Estate is an inspection you will not want to miss.
This neat and tidy home is high on the family comforts including generous master with walk in robe and ensuite, two out of the three remaining rooms have built in robes and three separate living zones, including a separate rumpus room and theatre room. A well-appointed open plan kitchen, dining and living zone with quality stainless steel appliances including 900mm stove and oven, dishwasher and breakfast bar.
The huge decked area is fantastic for entertaining, you have some amazing views to enjoy which also comes with a low maintenance yard.
Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote double garage, internal and external access, alarm system, large laundry with storage and side gate access.
Situated minutes away from the Arena Shopping Centre in Officer, the extremely popular St. Francis Xavier College, St. Claires primary school, easy access to the Cardinia train station and various bus stops, as well as all major arterial roads including the Princes Highway.
Be quick to attend the first open for inspection as opportunities like this do not last long.

Description:
Immaculate - 1.5 Years Young!
Situated in the popular Cherrington Estate is this immaculate 1.5 year young home. Accommodating for first home buyers, downsizers, or perfect for the savvy investor looking for a sure investment. Boasting an attractive facade and landscaped gardens you are welcomed in. The heart of the home is the charming open living, with hostess kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances and plenty of bench and cupboard space. Adjacent is the naturally lit dining and living area. The master suite includes ensuite as well as WIR. With the two remaining bedrooms being serviced by BIR, and the sophisticated main bathroom. A great floorplan with practicality and versatility. Absolutely nothing to do but move it!
The yard features fantastic decked area, as well as a grassed area and low maintenance greenery. A wonderful atmosphere to enjoy your family and friends company.
Ducted heating, floating floors throughout, ample downlights, and internal access to the single lock up garage. Close proximity to Beaconsfield village, prestigious schools, public transport, freeway access and all amenities.
Call today, this one will not last!

Description:
ULTRA MODERN, CHIC TOWNHOUSE LIFESTYLE – OFFICER
Brilliant location and NO BODY CORP...
This stylish townhouse offers sophisticated living just a stroll from shops, cafés, supermarket, medical centre, schools and the Cardinia Train Station.
Built in 2013 by AV Jennings the floor plan is spacious with an open plan living area downstairs that features a meals area and kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and loads of cupboard space. The living area flows naturally out to a rear patio that's ideal for outdoor dining or simply just relaxing.
Upstairs you'll find another living area or open study and 3 double bedrooms, the master has a large BIR and ensuite with oversized shower, while the remaining bedrooms have BIR's and are serviced by the main bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet.
This easy to maintain property is NBN ready and also features a double remote garage with internal access, heating and cooling, separate laundry and under stair storage.
DO NOT DELAY, call to arrange your viewing urgently.

Description:
Classy Ex-display in Arena
Positioned perfectly for easy access to major shopping hubs, services, schools, parkland, sporting facilities and public transport (Officer Rail Station) this classy ex-display in the highly regarded Arena Estate ticks boxes before you even walk inside. With picture perfect presentation and all the hallmarks of a quality build including high ceilings, polished hardwood floors, stone benchtops and top of the range stainless steel appliances and soft furnishings, ducted heating/ evaporative cooling, two way gas log fire and a complete landscaping package this is a truly sublime home, fitted out with unsurpassed attention to detail and all on a perfect 512sqm allotment.
Multiple light filled formal and informal living areas include, formal lounge room, informal living, informal dining, rumpus room, plus the absolute last word in outdoor living! Accessed by three sets of glazed concertina timber doors this fabulous covered and timber decked outdoor living area complete with a built in BBQ and a feature gas log fire will become a year around hub for the whole family. With four double sized bedrooms, the main bedroom with full ensuite bathroom and private balcony, plus linear study, family bathroom, fully fitted laundry and an oversized two car garage (auto-remote) with direct to house access all adds up to a truly enviable family home! Inspect with absolute confidence!

Description:
Smart Combination - House & Land Package
Sitting proud in the highly sought-after Timbertop Estate, this 613sqm parcel of land is yours for the taking. The block resides opposite native parklands, never to be built on, creating a peaceful country atmosphere right in the heart of this prized location.
Combining with Smarthomes we give you the stunning Laila to take all the frustration of finding and dealing with different builders and trades, all the hard work has been done! A home with understated elegance, 3 bedrooms, dual living areas and bursting with character and charm this proposed floor plan offers standard inclusions but can be upgraded and amended to suit your needs.
The Timbertop Estate offers easy access to both Beaconsfield and Pakenham and every bit in-between, an abundance of schools both primary and secondary and best of all the wineries, cafés & specialty shops.
*Disclaimer - Displayed price includes standard inclusions, upgrades on both floor plan & specifications are available and price will be determined by Smarthomes vic.

Description:
A Place to call home.
This rare gem in the beautiful and sought after Arena estate is set to impress and comes with all the bells and whistle that you would expect from a Porter Davis home.
With high ceilings and cornices throughout you will be in awe of the space and flow of this stunning home as soon as you enter the front door.
Situated on a generous 576m2 approx. parcel of land, the list of features in this home goes on and on.
- 4 spacious bedrooms.
- Master with walk in robe and full ensuite.
- Additional study, rumpus room and separate living area.
- Alfresco area under roof line.
- Fully appointed kitchen with butler's pantry and SS dishwasher and oven.
- Double remote lock up garage.
- Walk in linen cupboard.
- Much much more that must be seen.
Within close proximity to all the things you look for. Schools, shops, train station, freeway access, medical center to name a few…….
This is a perfect opportunity in an ideal location that will deliver the memories and the lifestyle that we all crave for many years to come.

Description:
There’s no place like home!
Perfectly positioned sits this impeccably present gem. Just 4 years young and built by SJD homes, this really will be an inspection you will not want to miss.
Comprising of three spacious bedrooms with master entailing walk in robe, ensuite, ceiling fan and plantation shutters, remaining two bedrooms boasting built in robes and a good size floor space. Moving throughout the home the floorplan is practical and ideal with a kitchen to impress the chef of the house hold including 900mm oven/stovetop, dishwasher and breakfast bar overlooking the decent sized open plan dining/ living area. Interior extras include hydronic heating and split system cooling.
Outside you’re welcomed with a double remote garage and low maintenance yards to the front and back so your weekends are not taken up by gardening. A good - sized pergola that allows you to have the great Australian dream to enjoy all summer long.
Situated on a 364sqm block and located just moments from Arena Parade shopping centre, Lakeside shopping centre, Cardinia train station, bus’s, parkland, restaurants, Café’s and a choice of schools.
Properties like this in the ultimate location are hard to come by, be quick to attend the first open inspection!

Description:
A turn-key home ready for its first occupants
In an emerging estate that is within minutes of Princes Highway and the Pakenham Bypass, this home is well positioned within easy reach of Beaconsfield and Pakenham amenities including shops, schools, buses and trains. Brand new and ready for its very first occupants, this home is turn-key ready and begs the question - why bother building when this saves the time and hassle of doing it yourself. Ideal for a young or growing family, the home features 2 living zones including a formal lounge and an open family/dining area that incorporates the gallery style kitchen with stone benches, stainless appliances including a 900mm freestanding oven/stove and dishwasher plus a generous walk in pantry. There are 4 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and an ensuite to complement the family bathroom and second toilet. In addition you'll also enjoy ducted heating, a double garage with remote door and internal access as well as a north facing backyard that is pleasingly free of grass to keep maintenance to a minimum. **PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS**

Description:
FOR SALE BY EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST
251 & 269 PRINCES HIGHWAY, OFFICER
5523 m2 & 6222m2
-ZONED - URBAN GROWTH ZONE
-RESIDENTIAL “A” 15 DWELLINGS PER HA
-WITHIN APPROVED OFFICER PSP
-ADJOINING PREMIUM SUBDIVISIONS
With development knocking on the back door these two parcels are in a high demand area. Minutes from direct access to the M1 Freeway & Pakenham rail line they are surrounded by high quality subdivisions. Excellent Private and Public schooling the area is seeing high demand from buyers wanting to utilize the proximity to Berwick and Beaconsfield townships facilities. A proposed activity centre site with supermarket and specialty shops is within view and bus services passing.
SUBMISSIONS CLOSING 1pm THURSDAY 14th DECEMBER 2017
FOR FURTHER INFORMATION MICHAEL PATCHELL 0419381411

Description:
The wait is over in Officer...!
The wait is over in Officer. Welcome to this beautiful home located in most sought after Arcadia Estate. This sensational 1 year young home which is ready for you to move in and enjoy. The Beauty is its fantastic location and position (north facing ). It is close to all amenities such as schools, Shopping Centres, public transport, Cardinia Road Station and easy M1 freeway access. This elegant home's features begin with its modern façade immediately radiating with impressing street appeal. On offer is the master bedroom with walk in robe and private en-suite with the comfort of Aircon. An additional three bedrooms fitted with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom and one of them is fitted with Aircon. At the heart of the home, sits a generous sized open plan kitchen, meals and living room with 40mm stone benches, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher overhead cabinetry and ample storage. An additional living zone is located to the front of the home.
Boasting sliding doors from the living area flowing outwards to the spectacular low maintenance back yard, which all contribute to a fantastic outdoor retreat. Plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor. The quality doesn't stop there, offering fantastic features such as 30 years structural warranty, ducted heating, LED lights, roller blinds, Porcelain tiles throughout, double remote garage with internal and rear access and easy to maintain garden. This Beautiful home is not going to last long on the market...!

Description:
Perfect Home Close To Everything!
Make no mistake, this home will sell! Located in the popular Arcadia estate, conveniently close to local schools, Shops, the Princes Freeway, M1, Cardinia Road Railway Station and public transport.
This young beautiful family home offers:
- Four spacious bedrooms
- Ensuite and Walk-in Robe to master
- Modern open plan living
- Generous size kitchen with plenty of space
- Outdoor alfresco great for entertaining!
- Easy to maintain garden
- Gas Ducted Heating
- Split system cooling
- Plus much, much more.....
It's an outstanding opportunity with plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor.
What more could you ask for!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our Business Development Department has appraised this property at $360- $365p/w ($1,564-$1,586) for more details about leasing contact office on 9705 3000 today.
